attributes.action: get staffordshire bull terrier put on dangerous dogs act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many more children are going to get mauled by this breed, children of different ages have been brutally attacked and a recent survey shown out of all the dogs not on the dogs act staffordshire bull terrier was the breed more likely to attack a child. Not only that with a natural fighting instinct they are a pest to dog owners i have had my dog attacked twice by this breed and have yet to meet a sociable SBT with other dogs. I was bitten in the process of trying to help my dog again this makes them a hazard to the general public.
Please lets help dog walkers walk with out the risk of getting mauled and more importantly STOP ANYMORE CHILDREN GETTING KILLED OR SAVADGELY ATTACKED BY THIS NATURAL FIGHTER
